title: 新增建筑师给了gm权限但是不能用？
author: ailiyixi
txt_content: 新增了一个build权限组，给了如下权限，但是好像没用啊？fly warp啥的能用，gm却不能用，禁止获取钻石块啊啥的但还是能捡到或者从创造模式下拿到……究竟怎样才能创建一个只能建筑不能与玩家互动的建筑师权限组啊？The group 'Build' has following permissions: -essentials.protect.pvp, -essentials.build.pickup.<41>[:gold_block], -essentials.build.pickup.<42>[:iron_block], -essentials.build.pickup.<52>[:mob_spawner], -essentials.build.pickup.<56>[:diamond_ore], -essentials.build.pickup.<57>[:diamond_block], -essentials.build.pickup.<119>[:end_portal], -essentials.build.pickup.<129>[:emerald_ore], -essentials.build.pickup.<122>[:dragon_egg], -essentials.build.pickup.<120>[:end_portal_frame], -essentials.build.pickup.<14>[:gold_ore], -essentials.build.pickup.<138>[:beacon], -essentials.build.pickup.<133>[:emerald_block], -essentials.build.pickup.<265>[:iron_ingot], -essentials.build.pickup.<264>[:diamond], -essentials.build.pickup.<15>[:iron_ore], -essentials.build.pickup.<388>[:emerald], -essentials.build.pickup.<266>[:gold_ingot], -essentials.build.place.<129>[:emerald_ore], -essentials.build.place.<122>[:dragon_egg], -essentials.build.place.<120>[:end_portal_frame], -essentials.build.place.<41>[:gold_block], -essentials.build.place.<42>[:iron_block], -essentials.build.place.<52>[:mob_spawner], -essentials.build.place.<56>[:diamond_ore], -essentials.build.place.<57>[:diamond_block], -essentials.build.place.<, -essentials.build.drop.<41>[:gold_block], -essentials.build.drop.<42>[:iron_block], -essentials.build.drop.<52>[:mob_spawner], -essentials.build.drop.<56>[:diamond_ore], -essentials.build.drop.<57>[:diamond_block], -essentials.build.drop.<119>[:, authme.player.changepassword, authme.player.email, authme.player.email.add, authme.player.email.change, authme.player.email.recover, authme.player.login, authme.player.logout, authme.player.register, authme.player.seeownaccounts, authme.player.unregister, essentials.back, essentials.back.ondeath, essentials.build, essentials.fly, essentials.gamemode, essentials.help, essentials.protect.damage.disable, essentials.spawn, essentials.speed, essentials.speed.bypass, replies.author: Anti@
replies.txt_content: 权限列表下面有个build选项 改为true

replies.author: Angelsquare
replies.txt_content: 这个需要其它插件配合吧，无法和其他玩家PY应该GM没有这个功能的。
